title-part.text: LABELLING OR TAGGING MACHINES, APPARATUS, OR PROCESSES

reference.text: nailing or stapling in general B25C, B27F; applying labels for packaging purposes B65B; labels, name-plates G09F
series-printing machines B41L; containers for the storage or transport of packages B65D

note.note-paragraph:
In this subclass, the following term is used with the meaning indicated:
- "labels" covers also decalcomanias, stamps or the like

reference.text: labelling of fabrics B65C5/00

title-part.text: Affixing labels to one flat surface of articles, e.g. of packages, of flat bands
